Just finished watching the first two sessions and everything seems to be good. Video is fine and audio is spot on (V-10, A-10 When I only put two sessions on a regular DVD disc using high quality to burn). Will be seeding for a bit more. I do like the previews at the end of the sessions, but not this version of the end credits as much as the the version I saw on the television. The swearing doesn't really add to the show, maybe even detracts a little. Didn't dl the movie on this torrent, seems to have problems and is short (Besides, I already have the movie). This is a VERY GOOD torrent!! Worth dling (skip the movie part). Thanks GS again for the avi version and your efforts on this one. MUCH appreciated! "Enjoy Space Cowboys"
